profile.name: Kenneth
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer | UI/UX Designer | Tech Innovator
profile.tagline: Crafting digital experiences that illuminate the web like the Northern Lights. Passionate about cutting-edge technology and beautiful, functional design.
bio: With over 7 years of experience in web development and design, I specialize in creating immersive digital experiences that captivate users and drive business growth.

My journey began with a fascination for the intersection of art and technology. Today, I work with cutting-edge technologies to build scalable, performant applications that push the boundaries of what's possible on the web.

experience.description: Lead development of enterprise-scale web applications, mentor junior developers, and architect cloud-native solutions using modern tech stacks.
Developed custom web applications for various clients, implemented responsive designs, and optimized application performance.
Created interactive user interfaces, implemented design mockups, and ensured cross-browser compatibility for client projects.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Custom web applications built with modern frameworks and best practices for optimal performance.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver seamless user experiences.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces designed with user experience at the forefront.

services.title: Cloud Solutions
services.description: Scalable cloud architecture and deployment strategies for modern applications.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Technical consulting and strategic planning for digital transformation initiatives.

services.title: API Integration
services.description: Seamless third-party API integrations and custom API development.
